an3.70:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
an3.70:1.3: Atha kho visākhā migāramātā tadahuposathe yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho visākhaṃ migāramātaraṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an3.70:1.4: “handa kuto nu tvaṃ, visākhe, āgacchasi divā divassā”ti?
an3.70:2.5: Seyyathāpi, visākhe, gopālako sāyanhasamaye sāmikānaṃ gāvo niyyātetvā iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an3.70:2.6: ‘ajja kho gāvo amukasmiñca amukasmiñca padese cariṃsu, amukasmiñca amukasmiñca padese pānīyāni piviṃsu;
an3.70:2.7: sve dāni gāvo amukasmiñca amukasmiñca padese carissanti, amukasmiñca amukasmiñca padese pānīyāni pivissantī’ti;
an3.70:2.8: evamevaṃ kho, visākhe, idhekacco uposathiko iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an3.70:2.9: ‘ahaṃ khvajja idañcidañca khādanīyaṃ khādiṃ, idañcidañca bhojanīyaṃ bhuñjiṃ;
an3.70:2.10: sve dānāhaṃ idañcidañca khādanīyaṃ khādissāmi, idañcidañca bhojanīyaṃ bhuñjissāmī’ti.
an3.70:2.11: So tena abhijjhāsahagatena cetasā divasaṃ atināmeti.
an3.70:2.13: Evaṃ upavuttho kho, visākhe, gopālakuposatho na mahapphalo hoti na mahānisaṃso na mahājutiko na mahāvipphāro. (1)
an3.70:3.4: ‘ehi tvaṃ, ambho purisa, ye puratthimāya disāya pāṇā paraṃ yojanasataṃ tesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipāhi;
an3.70:3.5: ye pacchimāya disāya pāṇā paraṃ yojanasataṃ tesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipāhi;
an3.70:3.6: ye uttarāya disāya pāṇā paraṃ yojanasataṃ tesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipāhi;
an3.70:3.7: ye dakkhiṇāya disāya pāṇā paraṃ yojanasataṃ tesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipāhī’ti.
an3.70:3.8: Iti ekaccānaṃ pāṇānaṃ anuddayāya anukampāya samādapenti, ekaccānaṃ pāṇānaṃ nānuddayāya nānukampāya samādapenti.
an3.70:3.10: ‘ehi tvaṃ, ambho purisa, sabbacelāni nikkhipitvā evaṃ vadehi—
an3.70:3.11: nāhaṃ kvacani kassaci kiñcanatasmiṃ, na ca mama kvacani katthaci kiñcanatatthī’ti.
an3.70:3.24: Iti yasmiṃ samaye sacce samādapetabbā musāvāde tasmiṃ samaye samādapenti.
an3.70:3.26: So tassā rattiyā accayena bhoge adinnaṃyeva paribhuñjati.
an3.70:3.29: Evaṃ upavuttho kho, visākhe, nigaṇṭhuposatho na mahapphalo hoti na mahānisaṃso na mahājutiko na mahāvipphāro. (2)
an3.70:4.2: Upakkiliṭṭhassa, visākhe, cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:4.3: Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti?
an3.70:4.5: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an3.70:4.6: Tassa tathāgataṃ anussarato cittaṃ pasīdati, pāmojjaṃ uppajjati.
an3.70:4.7: seyyathāpi, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa sīsassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:5.1: Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa sīsassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti?
an3.70:5.2: Kakkañca paṭicca mattikañca paṭicca udakañca paṭicca purisassa ca tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ paṭicca, evaṃ kho, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa sīsassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:5.3: Evamevaṃ kho, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:6.1: Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti?
an3.70:6.3: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an3.70:6.4: Tassa tathāgataṃ anussarato cittaṃ pasīdati, pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyanti.
an3.70:6.6: ‘ariyasāvako brahmuposathaṃ upavasati, brahmunā saddhiṃ saṃvasati, brahmañcassa ārabbha cittaṃ pasīdati, pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyanti’.
an3.70:6.7: Evaṃ kho, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti. (3.1)
an3.70:7.1: Upakkiliṭṭhassa, visākhe, cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:7.2: Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti?
an3.70:7.4: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī’ti.
an3.70:7.5: Tassa dhammaṃ anussarato cittaṃ pasīdati, pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyanti, seyyathāpi, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa kāyassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:8.1: Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa kāyassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti?
an3.70:8.2: Sottiñca paṭicca, cuṇṇañca paṭicca, udakañca paṭicca, purisassa ca tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ paṭicca.
an3.70:8.3: Evaṃ kho, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa kāyassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:8.4: Evamevaṃ kho, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:9.1: Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti?
an3.70:9.3: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī’ti.
an3.70:9.4: Tassa dhammaṃ anussarato cittaṃ pasīdati, pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyanti.
an3.70:9.5: Ayaṃ vuccati, visākhe, ‘ariyasāvako dhammuposathaṃ upavasati, dhammena saddhiṃ saṃvasati, dhammañcassa ārabbha cittaṃ pasīdati, pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyanti’.
an3.70:9.6: Evaṃ kho, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti. (3.2)
an3.70:10.1: Upakkiliṭṭhassa, visākhe, cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:10.2: Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti?
an3.70:10.4: ‘suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, ujuppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, ñāyappaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassā’ti.
an3.70:10.5: Tassa saṅghaṃ anussarato cittaṃ pasīdati, pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyanti, seyyathāpi, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa vatthassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:11.1: Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa vatthassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti?
an3.70:11.2: Usmañca paṭicca, khārañca paṭicca, gomayañca paṭicca, udakañca paṭicca, purisassa ca tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ paṭicca.
an3.70:11.3: Evaṃ kho, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa vatthassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:11.4: Evamevaṃ kho, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:12.1: Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti?
an3.70:12.4: Tassa saṅghaṃ anussarato cittaṃ pasīdati, pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyanti.
an3.70:12.5: Ayaṃ vuccati, visākhe, ‘ariyasāvako saṅghuposathaṃ upavasati, saṅghena saddhiṃ saṃvasati, saṅghañcassa ārabbha cittaṃ pasīdati, pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyanti’.
an3.70:12.6: Evaṃ kho, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti. (3.3)
an3.70:13.1: Upakkiliṭṭhassa, visākhe, cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:13.2: Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti?
an3.70:13.3: Idha, visākhe, ariyasāvako attano sīlāni anussarati akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikāni.
an3.70:13.4: Tassa sīlaṃ anussarato cittaṃ pasīdati, pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyanti, seyyathāpi, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa ādāsassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:14.1: Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa ādāsassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti?
an3.70:14.2: Telañca paṭicca, chārikañca paṭicca, vālaṇḍupakañca paṭicca, purisassa ca tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ paṭicca.
an3.70:14.3: Evaṃ kho, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa ādāsassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:14.4: Evamevaṃ kho, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:15.1: Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti?
an3.70:15.2: Idha, visākhe, ariyasāvako attano sīlāni anussarati akhaṇḍāni …pe… samādhisaṃvattanikāni.
an3.70:15.3: Tassa sīlaṃ anussarato cittaṃ pasīdati, pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyanti.
an3.70:15.4: Ayaṃ vuccati, visākhe, ‘ariyasāvako sīluposathaṃ upavasati, sīlena saddhiṃ saṃvasati, sīlañcassa ārabbha cittaṃ pasīdati, pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyanti’.
an3.70:15.5: Evaṃ kho, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti. (3.4)
an3.70:16.1: Upakkiliṭṭhassa, visākhe, cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:16.2: Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti?
an3.70:16.4: ‘santi devā cātumahārājikā, santi devā tāvatiṃsā, santi devā yāmā, santi devā tusitā, santi devā nimmānaratino, santi devā paranimmitavasavattino, santi devā brahmakāyikā, santi devā tatuttari.
an3.70:16.5: Yathārūpāya saddhāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tatthupapannā, mayhampi tathārūpā saddhā saṃvijjati.
an3.70:16.6: Yathārūpena sīlena samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tatthupapannā, mayhampi tathārūpaṃ sīlaṃ saṃvijjati.
an3.70:16.7: Yathārūpena sutena samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tatthupapannā, mayhampi tathārūpaṃ sutaṃ saṃvijjati.
an3.70:16.8: Yathārūpena cāgena samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tatthupapannā, mayhampi tathārūpo cāgo saṃvijjati.
an3.70:16.9: Yathārūpāya paññāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tatthupapannā, mayhampi tathārūpā paññā saṃvijjatī’ti.
an3.70:16.10: Tassa attano ca tāsañca devatānaṃ saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarato cittaṃ pasīdati, pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyanti, seyyathāpi, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa jātarūpassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:17.1: Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa jātarūpassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti?
an3.70:17.2: Ukkañca paṭicca, loṇañca paṭicca, gerukañca paṭicca, nāḷikasaṇḍāsañca paṭicca, purisassa ca tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ paṭicca.
an3.70:17.3: Evaṃ kho, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa jātarūpassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:17.4: Evamevaṃ kho, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
an3.70:18.1: Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti?
an3.70:18.3: ‘santi devā cātumahārājikā, santi devā tāvatiṃsā …pe… santi devā tatuttari.
an3.70:18.4: Yathārūpāya saddhāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tatthupapannā, mayhampi tathārūpā saddhā saṃvijjati. Yathārūpena sīlena … sutena … cāgena … paññāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tatthupapannā, mayhampi tathārūpā paññā saṃvijjatī’ti.
an3.70:18.5: Tassa attano ca tāsañca devatānaṃ saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarato cittaṃ pasīdati, pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyanti.
an3.70:18.6: Ayaṃ vuccati, visākhe, ‘ariyasāvako devatuposathaṃ upavasati, devatāhi saddhiṃ saṃvasati, devatā ārabbha cittaṃ pasīdati, pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyanti’.
an3.70:18.7: Evaṃ kho, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti. (3.5)
an3.70:19.1: Sa kho so, visākhe, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an3.70:19.2: ‘yāvajīvaṃ arahanto pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā nihitadaṇḍā nihitasatthā lajjī dayāpannā sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharanti;
an3.70:19.3: ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharāmi.
an3.70:19.4: Imināpi aṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.
an3.70:20.1: Yāvajīvaṃ arahanto adinnādānaṃ pahāya adinnādānā paṭiviratā dinnādāyī dinnapāṭikaṅkhī, athenena sucibhūtena attanā viharanti;
an3.70:20.2: ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ adinnādānaṃ pahāya adinnādānā paṭivirato dinnādāyī dinnapāṭikaṅkhī, athenena sucibhūtena attanā viharāmi.
an3.70:20.3: Imināpi aṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.
an3.70:21.1: Yāvajīvaṃ arahanto abrahmacariyaṃ pahāya brahmacārī ārācārī viratā methunā gāmadhammā;
an3.70:21.2: ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ abrahmacariyaṃ pahāya brahmacārī ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an3.70:21.3: Imināpi aṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.
an3.70:22.1: Yāvajīvaṃ arahanto musāvādaṃ pahāya musāvādā paṭiviratā saccavādī saccasandhā thetā paccayikā avisaṃvādakā lokassa;
an3.70:22.2: ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ musāvādaṃ pahāya musāvādā paṭivirato saccavādī saccasandho theto paccayiko avisaṃvādako lokassa.
an3.70:22.3: Imināpi aṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.
an3.70:23.1: Yāvajīvaṃ arahanto surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratā;
an3.70:23.2: ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato.
an3.70:23.3: Imināpi aṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.
an3.70:24.1: Yāvajīvaṃ arahanto ekabhattikā rattūparatā viratā vikālabhojanā;
an3.70:24.2: ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ ekabhattiko rattūparato virato vikālabhojanā.
an3.70:24.3: Imināpi aṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.
an3.70:25.2: ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ naccagītavāditavisūkadassanamālāgandhavilepanadhāraṇamaṇḍanavibhūsanaṭṭhānā paṭivirato.
an3.70:25.3: Imināpi aṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.
an3.70:26.1: Yāvajīvaṃ arahanto uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ pahāya uccāsayanamahāsayanā paṭiviratā nīcaseyyaṃ kappenti mañcake vā tiṇasanthārake vā;
an3.70:26.2: ahampajja imañca rattiṃ imañca divasaṃ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ pahāya uccāsayanamahāsayanā paṭivirato nīcaseyyaṃ kappemi mañcake vā tiṇasanthārake vā.
an3.70:26.3: Imināpi aṅgena arahataṃ anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatī’ti.
an3.70:27.2: Evaṃ upavuttho kho, visākhe, ariyuposatho mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso mahājutiko mahāvipphāro.
an3.70:28.2: Seyyathāpi, visākhe, yo imesaṃ soḷasannaṃ mahājanapadānaṃ pahūtarattaratanānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ kāreyya, seyyathidaṃ—
an3.70:28.3: aṅgānaṃ, magadhānaṃ, kāsīnaṃ, kosalānaṃ, vajjīnaṃ, mallānaṃ, cetīnaṃ, vaṅgānaṃ, kurūnaṃ, pañcālānaṃ, macchānaṃ, sūrasenānaṃ, assakānaṃ, avantīnaṃ, gandhārānaṃ, kambojānaṃ, aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatassa uposathassa etaṃ kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasiṃ.
an3.70:28.5: Kapaṇaṃ, visākhe, mānusakaṃ rajjaṃ dibbaṃ sukhaṃ upanidhāya.
an3.70:29.1: Yāni, visākhe, mānusakāni paññāsa vassāni, cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ eso eko rattindivo.
an3.70:29.4: Tena saṃvaccharena dibbāni pañca vassasatāni cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ.
an3.70:29.5: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, visākhe, vijjati yaṃ idhekacco itthī vā puriso vā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavasitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
an3.70:29.6: Idaṃ kho panetaṃ, visākhe, sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
an3.70:30.1: Yaṃ, visākhe, mānusakaṃ vassasataṃ, tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ eso eko rattindivo.
an3.70:30.4: Tena saṃvaccharena dibbaṃ vassasahassaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ.
an3.70:30.5: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, visākhe, vijjati yaṃ idhekacco itthī vā puriso vā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavasitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
an3.70:30.6: Idaṃ kho panetaṃ, visākhe, sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
an3.70:31.1: Yāni, visākhe, mānusakāni dve vassasatāni, yāmānaṃ devānaṃ eso eko rattindivo.
an3.70:31.4: Tena saṃvaccharena dibbāni dve vassasahassāni yāmānaṃ devānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ.
an3.70:31.5: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, visākhe, vijjati yaṃ idhekacco itthī vā puriso vā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavasitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā yāmānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
an3.70:31.6: Idaṃ kho panetaṃ, visākhe, sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
an3.70:32.1: Yāni, visākhe, mānusakāni cattāri vassasatāni, tusitānaṃ devānaṃ eso eko rattindivo.
an3.70:32.4: Tena saṃvaccharena dibbāni cattāri vassasahassāni tusitānaṃ devānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ.
an3.70:32.5: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, visākhe, vijjati yaṃ idhekacco itthī vā puriso vā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavasitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā tusitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
an3.70:32.6: Idaṃ kho panetaṃ, visākhe, sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
an3.70:33.1: Yāni, visākhe, mānusakāni aṭṭha vassasatāni, nimmānaratīnaṃ devānaṃ eso eko rattindivo.
an3.70:33.4: Tena saṃvaccharena dibbāni aṭṭha vassasahassāni nimmānaratīnaṃ devānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ.
an3.70:33.5: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, visākhe, vijjati yaṃ idhekacco itthī vā puriso vā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavasitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā nimmānaratīnaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
an3.70:33.6: Idaṃ kho panetaṃ, visākhe, sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
an3.70:34.1: Yāni, visākhe, mānusakāni soḷasa vassasatāni, paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ devānaṃ eso eko rattindivo.
an3.70:34.4: Tena saṃvaccharena dibbāni soḷasa vassasahassāni paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ devānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ.
an3.70:34.5: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, visākhe, vijjati yaṃ idhekacco itthī vā puriso vā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavasitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
an3.70:34.6: Idaṃ kho panetaṃ, visākhe, sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
an3.70:35.2: Musā na bhāse na ca majjapo siyā;
an3.70:36.1: Mālaṃ na dhāre na ca gandhamācare,
an3.70:37.1: Cando ca suriyo ca ubho sudassanā,
an3.70:40.1: Tasmā hi nārī ca naro ca sīlavā,
